alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Mayes; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 10:27PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BENTON...SOUTHERN CRAIG...DELAWARE...SOUTHERN OTTAWA AND NORTHEASTERN MAYES COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1027 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Big Cabin to 3 miles west of Grove to 6 miles north of Kansas. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Vinita... Jay... Grove... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... Afton... Langley... Colcord... Adair... Highfill... Bernice... Ketchum... Spavinaw... Disney... Big Cabin... Pensacola... Springtown... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 269 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Oklahoma.
